summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Map Your Friends MVP. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend loads and most functionality works, but modal overlay issues prevent complete user interaction flow.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal backdrop overlay intercepts pointer events, preventing clicks on other UI elements after search modal is opened
ui_bugs.impact: Blocks user interaction with sidebar and other elements after search is used

issues: Console errors for failed resource loading (likely external resources)

passed_tests: Landing page renders with Get Started and Sign In buttons
Dashboard loads after authentication with map and sidebar
Profile modal opens and form fields work
Meetup modal opens and form fields work
Search modal opens and input works
All sidebar navigation buttons present and functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay interception issue in search modal - the backdrop overlay is preventing clicks on other UI elements after search modal is opened. This blocks the complete user interaction flow.
